caption.body: Kids’ Spots are exploration areas that allow children to “let off steam” prior to their flights. Terminal 3 Boarding Area F Kids’ Spot is located post-security near Gate 87A and features interactive displays of weather elements from the Exploratorium in San Francisco. Terminal 3 Boarding Area E Kids’ Spot is located post- security near Gate 62 and features Eric Staller’s Spirogyrate, a series of six-foot diameter spirals that are activated by motion sensors. Terminal 2’s Kids’ Spots are located post-security near Gates 54A and 58B and feature original artworks by Bay Area artists Walter Kitundu and Charles Sowers that operate as interactive learning and play stations.
caption.excerpt: Kids’ Spots are exploration areas that allow children to “let off steam” prior to their flights.
